title: Ethiopia's new president: Taye Atske Selassie replaces Sahle-Work Zewde
snippet: Taye Astike Selassie, foreign minister since February, has taken up the largely ceremonial role. In Ethiopia, political power lies with the prime minister - currently Abiy Ahmed.

title: Ethiopia’s Economic Reform Demonstrates Strategic Progress – Government Communication Service
snippet: Addis Ababa, Ethiopia- 17 December 2017 Addis Ababa, recognized as a crucial hub for both African and global diplomacy, is vigorously prepared to host the 38th African Union Summit on February 8-9/2017 E.C or February 15-16/2025 G.C.

title: Chairperson Welcomes Appointment of New President of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, Commends Tenure of Former President Zewde | African Union
snippet: The Chairperson further reiterates the continued support of the African Union Commission to the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia's journey to deepen the country’s democracy and sustainable development. ...
